DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of the trial are to investigate the effect of concurrent administration of rifampicin and probenecid on the pharmacokinetics of empagliflozin.
DOC.brief_title: Drug-interaction Trial in Healthy Subjects With Oral Administration of Empagliflozin (BI 10773), Rifampicin and Probenecid
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
